OPEN TNNES - HOT TO FIX (WOOHYUN SHIPPING / KOREA)Direct local owner
- OPEN TOKYO BAY, JAPAN O/A 20/21 AUG.
- LOOK FOR P/C (ABT 10K INCL DECK) TO THE CONTI RANGE OR EN ROUTE
MV. S CLEVER
BLT JULY 2014, SAIKI (ONOMICHI) HEAVY INDUSTRIES CO., LTD. (HULL NO. 586), JAPAN ABT 37,084 DWT ON 10.869M SSW – TPC 45.67 MT IMO NO: 9606039 CLASS NK – NEXT SS/DD DUE JULY 2024 DIMS: 177.85M LOA / 169.90M LBP / 28.60M BEAM / 15.00M DEPTH 5 HO/HA - HOLDS #2/3/4) BOX SHAPE – DOUBLE HULL HATCH SIZES: NO. 1 (15.2 X 20 M); NO.2 – NO.5 (22.4 X 24) CRANE 30T X 4 -ADA-
- OPEN MALE, MALDIVES O/A 3/6 SEP.
- LOOK FOR CGO TO THE SPORE/JPN RGE (TCT OK)
MV. S YOKOHAMA
GCS, BUILT IN 2023, JAPAN. PANAMA FLAG, NK. CLASS. P&I COVERED. ABT 13,500 DWT @ 9.10M DRAFT. LOA 122.90M., LBP 116.0M. DEPTH 14.3M; G/B CAPA: 20,400/18,818 CBM. 2HO/2HA; HATCH SIZE(Meter) : NO.1) 29.25Mx 15.0M(Upper) / 29.25Mx 15.0 M(Lower); NO.2) 29.25Mx 15.0M(Upper) / 29.25Mx 15.0 M (Lower) CRANE CAPACITY: 36T * 32M*2 (COMBINE UPTO 72MT) -ADA-
Regards / K Y Lee–Chartering Director
